description: Build a roster page for the franchise simulation game that displays all players on the user's team with filtering and sorting capabilities. The page uses the existing GameplayHeader from the dashboard layout and features tabs (ALL/Offense/Defense/ST), position dropdown filter, and sort options via bottom sheet.
goal: Allow users to view and manage their team roster with an intuitive mobile-first interface that matches the design in roster.png
requirements: Display player list with simplified cards (jersey number, name, position, OVR)
Tab navigation for ALL/Offense/Defense/ST position groups
Position dropdown filter within selected tab
Sort functionality via bottom sheet (OVR, Name, Position, Age)
OVR color coding (red for <80, white for normal)
Navigate to player detail on card tap
Load roster data from useCareerStore via getTeamById()
